definition: irrigation with a jet of water or medicated solution into or around a body part (especially the vagina) to treat infections or cleanse from odorous contents, direct a spray of water into a bodily cavity, for cleaning
details:
noun
- irrigation with a jet of water or medicated solution into or around a body part (especially the vagina) to treat infections or cleanse from odorous contents
- a small syringe with detachable nozzles
= synonyms: douche bag
verb
- direct a spray of water into a bodily cavity, for cleaning
